review: I've had it about a week and I think it's great!  Menus are easy to navigate, remote is responsive - for instance, using the YouTube app on here is much easier than the app on my parent's smart tv.  I have an older model HD tv not a smart tv which is why I bought this.  I even just splurged and bought the game remote and downloaded a game for the fire as well.  Something I never planned on doing.  I'm not sure why certain reviews state that people have had a hard time using for anything other than Prime - not my experience at all.  Recently Used apps are right at the top so I rarely have to look any further.  So far I've used it for music, Netflix, Hulu, Prime, YouTube, and a game and no complaints so far.  It's so small and the box and the remotes are very sleek.  Voice search works pretty well also although I haven't used it much.  No complaints from me!
